In the 20+ years that Hollywood has been obsessed with the superhero genre, there have been only two blockbuster productions starring major black superheroes. 
 
That's right two: Blade and Spawn. 
 
But, things are looking up. within the next five years we'll be getting a Black Panther movie and a Cyborg movie, plus Luke Cage bursting onto the Netflix scene as early as this year. And we can only hope that this is the beginning of a trend that is poised to continue. 
 
But are you ready? How well do you know the major players in the Black Superhero game? Well, you can take this quiz and find out.
